meanings.definition: The act of digging up something buried, especially a dead body.
meanings.sent1: The exhumations of ancient artifacts fascinated the archaeologists.
meanings.sent2: The exhumations of the graves were conducted by forensic experts.
meanings.sent3: The exhumations of buried treasure led to unexpected discoveries.
meanings.sent4: The exhumations of long-forgotten secrets brought closure to the family.
meanings.sent5: The exhumations of the past revealed stories of bygone eras.

meanings.definition: The process of uncovering or revealing something hidden or forgotten.
meanings.sent1: The exhumations of old documents shed light on historical events.
meanings.sent2: The exhumations of memories from childhood can be emotional.
meanings.sent3: The exhumations of family recipes brought back nostalgic flavors.
meanings.sent4: The exhumations of buried emotions can be overwhelming.
meanings.sent5: The exhumations of buried truths changed everything.
